name: Joint Solicitor Notice of Proceedings NOP JSE1
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant 1: ((applicant name))
Applicant 2: ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

#Notice of proceedings

Dear ((solicitor name))

This joint ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application has been checked by court staff and issued. You need to confirm receipt of the Notice of Proceedings in your HMCTS account.  

Confirm receipt: ((signin url))

You can apply for a conditional order from ((date of response)).

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Joint ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application issued: ((reference number))
